NAME.Nominative: Saturday of the 2<sup>nd</sup> week after Pentecost. Venerable and God-bearing fathers, who have shown forth on the Holy Mountain of Athos (from the 2<sup>nd</sup> Sunday)
NAME.Short: Saturday of the 2<sup>nd</sup> week after Pentecost. Venerable and God-bearing fathers, who have shown forth on the Holy Mountain of Athos (from the 2<sup>nd</sup> Sunday)
